name: The Belfry (gamez7)
description:
My entry to Miz Jam 1 and my first ever game jam project!

How to Play

Use the objects in each room to herd the bats to the exit and win! Make sure to prevent them from returning to their roost.

Controls

  • WASD: movement
  • Left-click: pick up or drop item
  • Right-clic: throw item
  • R: restart level

Credits

Design, programming, sfx by Reid Huntley
Sprites: "1-Bit Pack" by Kenney
Music: "Flowers" by Llydia Lancaster
Made with Godot Engine
